title: Label height doesn't change with label font modification.
description: Label font size doesn't change right away when it is modified.
OB: Label height is not correctly adjusted after modifying the label font size.
EB: The label height should be automatically adjusted according to the new font size when it is modified.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Add a label.
2. Edit the label's font size to '18 points'.
3. Verify that the label height is not changed to accommodate the new font size.
